title: Global Flexible Packaging Market 2015-2019 - Growing Demand
text:
DUBLIN , Oct. 23,   Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/39kqdc/global_flexible ) has announced the addition of the "Global Flexible Packaging Market 2015-2019" report to their offering. The global flexible packaging market to grow at a CAGR of 5.38% over the period 2014-2019 
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global flexible packaging market for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of flexible packaging products manufactured by vendors for the packaging of food and beverages. It also includes the market size in terms of volume that has been calculated based on the production of flexible packaging products. The report segments the market on basis of raw materials, product types, and geography. It also discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market and summarizes the challenges faced by the vendors and the market at large, and the key trends that are emerging in the market.
According to the report, most flexible packaging designs such as zippers, pouring spouts, peel-off lids, and microwavable pouches provide consumers with convenience in consuming and disposing of products. Such packaging designs are being increasingly produced to meet the growing consumer demand for food and beverage products that offer higher convenience and portability. Many packaging companies are planning to devise innovative products. Most of them are focused on inventing new packaging designs or attempting to redesign existing packaging.
Further, the report states that the highly fragmented nature of the market is proving to be a major challenge for vendors.
